schema.title: WellPressureTestInterpretation
schema.description: Entity aiming to capture the results of interpretations carried out on the results of a well test activity. Intended to be partnered with a WellPressureTestRawMeasurement WPC that captures raw measurements before any kind of processing, composing, interpretation or analysis

id.description: Previously called ResourceID or SRN which identifies this OSDU resource object without version.
id.title: Entity ID

kind.description: The schema identification for the OSDU resource object following the pattern {Namespace}:{Source}:{Type}:{VersionMajor}.{VersionMinor}.{VersionPatch}. The versioning scheme follows the semantic versioning, https://semver.org/.
kind.title: Entity Kind

version.description: The version number of this OSDU resource; set by the framework.
version.title: Version Number

acl.description: The access control tags associated with this entity.
acl.title: Access Control List

legal.description: The entity's legal tags and compliance status. The actual contents associated with the legal tags is managed by the Compliance Service.
legal.title: Legal Tags

tags.title: Tag Dictionary
tags.description: A generic dictionary of string keys mapping to string value. Only strings are permitted as keys and values.

createTime.description: Timestamp of the time at which initial version of this OSDU resource object was created. Set by the System. The value is a combined date-time string in ISO-8601 given in UTC.
createTime.title: Resource Object Creation DateTime

createUser.title: Resource Object Creation User Reference
createUser.description: The user reference, which created the first version of this resource object. Set by the System.

modifyTime.description: Timestamp of the time at which this version of the OSDU resource object was created. Set by the System. The value is a combined date-time string in ISO-8601 given in UTC.
modifyTime.title: Resource Object Version Creation DateTime

modifyUser.title: Resource Object Version Creation User Reference
modifyUser.description: The user reference, which created this version of this resource object. Set by the System.

ancestry.description: The links to data, which constitute the inputs, from which this record instance is derived.
ancestry.title: Ancestry

meta.description: The Frame of Reference meta data section linking the named properties to self-contained definitions.
meta.title: Frame of Reference Meta Data

WellPressureTestRawMeasurementID.title: Well Pressure Test Raw Measurement ID
WellPressureTestRawMeasurementID.description: Identifier of the related Well Pressure Test Raw Measurement Work Product Component

WellPressureTestRawMeasurementTestIdenti.title: Well Pressure Test Raw Measurement Test Identifier
WellPressureTestRawMeasurementTestIdenti.description: Optional Identifier of the Test Number that is most representative of the overall interpretation within the related Well Pressure Test Raw Measurement Work Product Component

WellPressureTestRawMeasurementTestPeriod.title: Well Pressure Test Raw Measurement Test Period Identifier
WellPressureTestRawMeasurementTestPeriod.description: Optional Identifier of the Test Measurement Period Number that is most representative of the overall interpretation within the related Well Pressure Test Raw Measurement Work Product Component

PressureTestInterpretationDateTime.title: Pressure Test Interpretation Date Time
PressureTestInterpretationDateTime.description: The date (and time) on which the interpretation was performed

InterpretationSubjectiveClassificationRa.title: Interpretation Subjective Classification Rating ID
InterpretationSubjectiveClassificationRa.description: The subjective quality classification of the analysis (interpretation) and its conclusions. E.g. Excellent, Good, Poor etc. A Confidence classification could also be used here if there is an issue with the certainty of the interpretation.

IsPreferred.title: Is Preferred
IsPreferred.description: Boolean indicating where this Interpretation is the preferred record where multiple interpretations may have been performed over time e.g. re-interpretation

InterpretationAnalysts.title: Interpretation Analysts
InterpretationAnalysts.description: The details of the individual(s) responsible for performing the interpretation activity

Remarks.title: Remarks
Remarks.description: Time stamped remarks associated with the interpretation activity

InterpretationResults.title: Interpretation Results
InterpretationResults.description: Array of detailed results of the interpretation activity

items.title: Interpretation Result
items.description: Contains the reservoir specific results of interpretations carried out on the results of well tests. Also contains the parameter values needed to calculate the pressure at reservoir datum.

WellPressureTestInterpretationNumber.title: Well Pressure Test Interpretation Number
WellPressureTestInterpretationNumber.description: The unique number of the result array member in the data.InterpretationResults[] array.

WellPressureTestAcquisitionStationIdenti.title: Well Pressure Test Acquisition Station Identifier
WellPressureTestAcquisitionStationIdenti.description: Optional Identifier of the Station Number that is most closely associated with this result within the related Well Pressure Test Raw Measurement Work Product Component

WellPressureTestRawMeasurementTestIdenti.title: Well Pressure Test Raw Measurement Test Identifier
WellPressureTestRawMeasurementTestIdenti.description: Optional Identifier of the Test Number that is most closely associated with this interpretation array element within the related Well Pressure Test Raw Measurement Work Product Component

WellPressureTestRawMeasurementTestPeriod.title: Well Pressure Test Raw Measurement Test Period Identifier
WellPressureTestRawMeasurementTestPeriod.description: Optional Identifier of the Test Period Number that is most closely associated with this interpretation array element within the related Well Pressure Test Raw Measurement Work Product Component

IsPreferred.title: Is Preferred
IsPreferred.description: Boolean indicating where this Interpretation result is the preferred where multiple interpretation results are present

InterpretationInput.title: Interpretation Input
InterpretationInput.description: Segment that contains important reference elements used to support the interpretation activity

WellboreMarkerSetID.title: Wellbore Marker Set ID
WellboreMarkerSetID.description: Optional reference to the WellboreMarkerSet containing the fluid contacts used for pressure test interpretation

GeoLabelSetID.title: Geo Label Set ID
GeoLabelSetID.description: Optional reference to the GeoLabelSet containing information related to the Reservoir or ReservoirSegment

PressureGradients.title: Pressure Gradients
PressureGradients.description: This contains the accepted fluid pressure gradients used in well test interpretation for the reservoir element. Fluid context is applied by the use of Facets e.g. what+Gas, what+Oil, qualifier+Total

items.title: Pressure Gradient
items.description: This contains the accepted fluid pressure gradients used in well test interpretation for the reservoir element. Fluid context is applied by the use of Facets e.g. what+Gas, what+Oil, qualifier+Total

PressureGradientValue.title: Pressure Gradient Value
PressureGradientValue.description: The gradient (change in pressure per unit length) value in the borehole, of the element defined by the FacetID, used for calculating the pressure in the perforated interval from pressure at sensor depth.

PressureGradientPositiveVerticalDeltaVal.title: Pressure Gradient Positive Vertical Delta Value
PressureGradientPositiveVerticalDeltaVal.description: The pressure gradient that represents the depth vertically above that marks the limit of the high confidence range for the fluid marker.

PressureGradientNegativeVerticalDeltaVal.title: Pressure Gradient Negative Vertical Delta Value
PressureGradientNegativeVerticalDeltaVal.description: The pressure gradient that represents the depth vertically below that marks the limit of the high confidence range for the fluid marker

PressureGradientCalculationMethodID.title: Pressure Gradient Calculation Method ID
PressureGradientCalculationMethodID.description: The method that was used to calculate the Pressure Gradient Value including the uncertainty range

PropertyType.title: Property Type
PropertyType.description: It holds the PropertyType associated with this reference property type, further defining the semantics of the value. It contains a relationship to PropertyType record and its (de-normalized) name. String or number values can represent e.g. A date or a time by referring to the respective PropertyType record id.

FacetIDs.title: Facet Ids
FacetIDs.description:
Unique Nested Ordered Array with: FacetType, FacetRole, both calling specific references

FacetType: Enumerations of the type of additional context about the nature of a property type (it may include conditions, direction, qualifiers, or statistics). 

FacetRole: Additional context about the nature of a property type. The purpose of such attribute is to minimize the need to create specialized property types by mutualizing some well known qualifiers such as "maximum", "minimum" which apply to a lot of different property types.

GradientsUOMID.title: Gradients Unit of Measure ID
GradientsUOMID.description: Unit of Measure used to capture Pressure Gradients - as not covered by Energistics Standard Units of Measure System

Parameters.title: Parameters
Parameters.description: Provides an array of general parameter values used in the Well Test Interpretation activity.

Remarks.title: Remarks
Remarks.description: Time stamped remarks associated with the input information used in the interpretation activity

DominantReservoirEntityID.title: Parent Reservoir Entity Id
DominantReservoirEntityID.description: Identifier linking to the dominant parent reservoir entity (It could be either a Reservoir or ReservoirSegment). This is the entity whose characteristics such as Reservoir Pressure are interpreted

CommingledReservoirEntityIDs.title: Commingled Reservoir Entity IDs
CommingledReservoirEntityIDs.description: Array of optional commingled Reservoirs or Reservoir Segments that contributed to the well test outcome.

GeologicUnitInterpretationIDs.title: Geologic Unit Interpretation Ids
GeologicUnitInterpretationIDs.description: An array of StratigraphicUnitInterpretation, GeobodyInterpretation or RockFluidUnitInterpretation record Ids evaluated by the interpretation activity

ReservoirDatumTrueVerticalDepth.title: Reservoir Datum True Vertical Depth
ReservoirDatumTrueVerticalDepth.description: The true vertical depth value for the reservoir pressure datum used in the analysis for calculation of the reservoir pressure. Note that this may vary from the reference depth record in the master-data Reservoir|ReservoirSegment as can change over the lifecycle of the Reservoir.

ReservoirDatumCalculationSubjectiveClass.title: Reservoir Datum Calculation Subjective Classification Rating ID
ReservoirDatumCalculationSubjectiveClass.description: The subjective quality classification of the datum calculation. E.g. Excellent, Good, Poor etc. A Confidence classification could also be used here if there is an issue with the certainty of the interpretation.

AppliedPressureCorrections.title: Applied Pressure Corrections
AppliedPressureCorrections.description: An array of pressure correction(s) applied when interpreting pressure from the gauge depth to the reservoir pressure datum.

items.title: Applied Pressure Correction
items.description: Pressure correction(s) applied when interpreting pressure from the gauge depth to the reservoir pressure datum. Further context can be applied to the Pressure Correction by the use of Facets e.g. what+Gas, what+Oil, qualifier+Total

PressureCorrectionValue.title: Pressure Correction Value
PressureCorrectionValue.description: The pressure correction value applied when interpreting pressure from the gauge depth to the reservoir pressure datum.

FacetIDs.title: Facet Ids
FacetIDs.description:
Unique Ordered Nested Array with: FacetType, FacetRole, both calling specific references

FacetType: Enumerations of the type of additional context about the nature of a property type (it may include conditions, direction, qualifiers, or statistics). 

FacetRole: Additional context about the nature of a property type. The purpose of such attribute is to minimize the need to create specialized property types by mutualizing some well known qualifiers such as "maximum", "minimum" which apply to a lot of different property types.

ReservoirPressureAtDatumDepth.title: Reservoir Pressure At Datum Depth
ReservoirPressureAtDatumDepth.description: The interpreted reservoir pressure at the reservoir datum depth

Remarks.title: Remarks
Remarks.description: Time stamped remarks associated with the reservoir properties calculation activity

InterpretationResultProperties.title: Interpretation Result Property Values
InterpretationResultProperties.description:
An embedded ColumnBasedTable with the properties including their values associated to the results in data.InterpretationResults[]. The association is done by array index.
This usage can be also manage through dataset with file or DDMS contents.
